articles.title: A Round Up Of Rani Mukerji's Birthday Festivities - NDTV
articles.description: Rani Mukerji's 45th birthday festivities began with a cake-cutting session with the paparazzi on birthday eve. On Tuesday, she flew out of Mumbai and happily posed for the cameras.

articles.title: Kartiki meets Stalin, receives ₹1 crore prize for Oscar win - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Oscar-winning director Kartiki Gonsalves was felicitated by Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin on Tuesday. She received a cash prize ₹1 crore as well.

articles.title: I'm not dead, social media killed me: Kota Srinivasa Rao clarifies - Telangana Today
articles.description: Kota Srinivasa Rao on Tuesday responded to rumours of his passing away that have been spreading on social media, and in a message clarified that he is alive and well.
